2: <pb/><t>¿Bak'in wal ok e bek wal e tx'emon aj can in yailal, c'al e yak'on cus in c'ul yetok e k'anej?</t>
3: <t>Ayexc'al oc e yalon yobal k'anej win. ¿Tom c'am chex q'uixwic'al quin e yuten axca tu'?</t>
4: <t>Caxc'al mi ay in mul xin, asanc'al ayin chi titcan wiban yuj in mul tu'.</t>
5: <t>Ac'ala' e maynenc'al e ba in satak, cax yuj in yailal ti' che yalon oc yin in sat tol yobtakwom in,</t>
6: <t>palta naek wali tol a Dios max in mitx'oni, a Cham chin ak'on ayc'ay yul jun yal ti'.</t>
7: <t>Ayin ti' chi el waw, chi waloni: Chin etaxi, quin chi. Tokwal ay mac chi tak'wi ayin. Chin k'an colwal yuj eb chin etneni, palta c'am mactxel chi watx'nen el in k'anej.</t>
8: <t>A Dios max makchen in be, c'amxa chi je' wec'tok. Axcaxac'al tol xol k'ekk'inal chin bey yuj.</t>
9: <t>Max pojaxcantok in beyomal; mayal yican el in mimanbilal.</t>
10: <t>Masanilxac'al bay max jayoc yailal wiban yuj Cham masantac'al chi yal in lajwi ayok. Max c'ayxac'alcan el in yipc'ulalil axcaxac'al yoclay aj junok te te'.</t>
11: <t>Max bekwal yowal c'ul wiban, axcaxac'al junok yajc'ul chin yutej.</t>
12: <t>Masanil is soldado Cham max jayoc oynaj win; toxac'al max oc oyan eb yin watut yet chi yak'on eb owal win.</t>
13: <pb/><t>Max yut Dios tol a eb wuẍtak c'al eb wamigo max elaj eb in c'atan, comon animaxac'al chin yut eb.</t>
14: <t>A eb wican c'al eb wamigo max in beklaycan yuj eb; c'al in tojcan c'ayc'ulal yuj eb.</t>
15: <t>A eb cajan wetok bay watut, yetokc'al eb ix in chekbej, tx'ok animailxac'al wayji yul sat eb, majxac'al in nachajtek yuj eb.</t>
16: <t>Ta chi wawtej junok eb in chekbej tu', tokwal chito tak'wi eb ayin, caxc'al tol chin tewi bay.</t>
17: <t>A xob in ti' c'amxa chi cha c'ul xal wetbi, toxac'al chin yajlay yuj eb wuẍtak.</t>
18: <t>Toltax eb unin chin yintaknej el eb; a yet chin yilon eb chi buchwaj eb.</t>
19: <t>A wal eb yelxac'al watx' wak'on yetok, chin yajlay yuj eb; a eb tol chi camil in c'ul yin, mayal oc eb ajc'ulal win.</t>
20: <t>Mayal oc lotzan in tz'umal yin in bakil, asanxanej yichlak we ayto in bak'chil.</t>
21: <t>Cusokab oc e c'ul win ex wamigo, yujtol a Dios max aon oc yailal wiban.</t>
22: <t>¿Tzet yuj xan tol chex tzaklojxac'al wintak axca chi yun Dios? ¿Tom mantoc'al k'okbilok quin e tx'emon cusok?</t>
23: <t>Tolok wal ay junok chi tz'iben masanil in k'anej ti' yin junok un; mata tol chi jotz'laycan oc yin ch'en ch'en.</t>
24: <t>Matawal ay junok chi tz'ibencan oc yin ch'en plomo yetok junok cincel tol hierro, cax chi cancan yin junelnej.</t>
25: <t>Wojtak, tol a mac chin coloni iquis ec'ok, a yet lajub c'ual ok jayoc waan sat tx'otx' ti'.</t>
26: <t>Caxc'al chi lajwi el in tz'umal ti', a yetok jun in mimanil ti' ok wiloc yin Dios.</t>
27: <t>Ayin wal caw ok wil wal oc yin; ayin wal caw ok wila', man tx'ok animailok yili ok wila'. <pb/>Lanan lajwi ay yip in c'ul</t>
28: <t>a yet chi waben tzet che yal ayex ti': ¿Tzet wal ok yun co tx'emonc'al cusok yujtol ac'al oc chi iontek jun yailal ti' yiban? quex chi.</t>
29: <t>Xiwanek bay ch'en espada xin, a ton ch'en chi yak'balnej Dios yuj yowal c'ul yin yobtakil. Ojtaknejek elok tol a Cham ok beyc'ulnenok, ẍi cham Job.</t>
